name: picture-makeup
short_description:
An image manipulation program and library. It supports a lot of effects, filters and image operations and the most used image formats. The idea is to give java programmers, image manipulation tools easy to use or incrust in their applications.

Usage (you need Java): 

The easy way: download the .jar and run

java -jar PictureMakeup.jar

The hard way, from the sources: 

0) install apache-ant
1) Get the sources: 

svn co https://svn.code.sf.net/p/cancerberosgxja/code/trunk/PictureMakeup

2) Compile it:
cd PictureMakerup
ant

3) Run it : 
java -jar dist/PictureMakeup.jar
